theme.spacing(4),\n    border: \"0\",\n    verticalAlign: \"top\"\n  }\n});\nconst tableContentCellStyles = {\n  root: {\n    border: \"0\",\n    verticalAlign: \"top\"\n  }\n};\nconst listStyles = (theme) => createStyles({\n  root: {\n    margin: theme.spacing(0, 0, -1, 0)\n  }\n});\nconst listItemStyles = (theme) => createStyles({\n  root: {\n    padding: theme.spacing(0, 0, 1, 0)\n  },\n @__PURE__ */ React__default.createElement(TableBody, null, children));\nconst MetadataTableItem = ({\n  title,\n  children,\n  ...rest\n}) => /* @__PURE__ */ React__default.createElement(TableRow, null, title && /* @__PURE__ */ React__default.createElement(TitleCell, null, title), /* @__PURE__ */ React__default.createElement(ContentCell, { colSpan: title ? 1 : 2, ...rest }, children));\nconst MetadataList = withStyles(listStyles, {\n  name: \"BackstageMetadataTableList\"\n})(({ classes, children }) => /* @__PURE__ */ React__default.createElement(List, { disablePadding: true, className: classes.root }, children));\nconst MetadataListItem = withStyles(listItemStyles, {\n  name: \"BackstageMetadataTableListItem\"\n})(({ classes, children }) => /* @__PURE__ */ '@material-ui/core/Typography';\nimport { MetadataList, MetadataTable, MetadataTableItem, MetadataListItem } from './MetadataTable.esm.js';\nimport { CodeSnippet } from '../CodeSnippet/CodeSnippet.esm.js';\nimport jsyaml from 'js-yaml';\nimport { createStyles, withStyles } from '@material-ui/core/styles';\n\nconst listStyle = createStyles({\n  root: {\n    margin: \"0 0\",\n    listStyleType: \"none\"\n  }\n});\nconst nestedListStyle = (theme) => createStyles({\n  root: {\n    ...listStyle.root,\n    paddingLeft: theme.spacing(1)\n  }\n});\nconst StyledList = withStyles(listStyle, {\n  name: \"BackstageStructuredMetadataTableList\"\n})(({ classes, children }) => /* @__PURE__ */ React__default.createElement(MetadataList, { classes }, children));\nconst StyledNestedList = withStyles(nestedListStyle, {\n  name: \"BackstageStructuredMetadataTableNestedList\"\n})(({ classes, children }) => /* @__PURE__ */ React__default.createElement(MetadataList, { classes }, children));\nfunction renderList(list, options, nested) {\n  const values = list.map((item, index) => /* @__PURE__ */ React__default.createElement(MetadataListItem, { key: index }, toValue(item, options, nested)));\n  return nested ? /* @__PURE__ */ React__default.createElement(StyledNestedList, null, values) : /* @__PURE__ */ React__default.createElement(StyledList, null, values);\n}\nfunction renderMap(map, options, nested) {\n  const values = Object.keys(map).map((key) => {\n    const value = toValue(map[key], options, true);\n    return /* @__PURE__ */ React__default.createElement(MetadataListItem, { key }, /* @__PURE__ */ React__default.createElement(Typography, { variant: \"body2\", component: \"span\" }, `${options.titleFormat(key)}: `), value);\n  });\n  return nested ? /* @__PURE__ */ React__default.createElement(StyledNestedList, null, values) : /* @__PURE__ */ React__default.createElement(StyledList, null, values);\n}\nfunction toValue(value, options, nested) {\n  if (React__default.isValidElement(value)) {\n    return /* @__PURE__ */ React__default.createElement(Fragment, null, value);\n  }\n  if (value !== null && typeof value === \"object\") {\n    if (options.nestedValuesAsYaml) {\n      return /* @__PURE__ */ React__default.createElement(\n        CodeSnippet,\n        {\n          language: \"yaml\",\n          text: jsyaml.dump(value),\n          customStyle: {\n            background: \"transparent\",\n            lineHeight: \"1.4\",\n            padding: \"0\",\n            margin: 0\n          }\n        }\n      );\n    }\n    if (!Array.isArray(value)) {\n      return renderMap(value, options, nested);\n    }\n  }\n  if (Array.isArray(value)) {\n    return renderList(value, options, nested);\n  }\n  if (typeof value === \"boolean\") {\n    return /* @__PURE__ */ React__default.createElement(Fragment, null, value ? \"\\u2705\" : \"\\u274C\");\n  }\n  return /* @__PURE__ */ React__default.createElement(Typography, { variant: \"body2\", component: \"span\" }, value);\n}\nconst ItemValue = ({ value, options }) => /* @__PURE__ */ React__default.createElement(Fragment, null, toValue(value, options, false));\nconst TableItem = ({\n  title,\n  value,\n  options\n}) => {\n  return /* @__PURE__ */ React__default.createElement(MetadataTableItem, { title: options.titleFormat(title) }, /* @__PURE__ */ React__default.createElement(ItemValue, { value, options }));\n};\nfunction mapToItems(info, options) {\n  return Object.keys(info).map((key) => /* @__PURE__ */ React__default.createElement(TableItem, { key, title: key, value: info[key], options }));\n}\nfunction StructuredMetadataTable(props) {\n  const { metadata, dense = true, options } = props;\n  const metadataItems = mapToItems(metadata, {\n    titleFormat: startCase,\n    nestedValuesAsYaml: options?.nestedValuesAsYaml ?? false,\n    ...options\n  });\n  return /* @__PURE__ */ React__default.createElement(MetadataTable, { dense }, metadataItems);\n}\n\nexport { StructuredMetadataTable };\n//# sourceMappingURL=StructuredMetadataTable.esm.js.map\n","import { makeStyles, Button, Drawer, Grid, Typography, IconButton } from '@material-ui/core';\nimport React from 'react';\nimport { StructuredMetadataTable } from '@backstage/core-components';\nimport OpenInNewIcon from '@material-ui/icons/OpenInNew';\nimport CloseIcon from '@material-ui/icons/Close';\nimport MaterialButton from '@material-ui/core/Button';\nimport { useApi, configApiRef } from '@backstage/core-plugin-api';\n\nconst useStyles = makeStyles({\n  paper: {\n    padding: \"2em\"\n  },\n  header: {\n    display: \"flex\",\n    flexDirection: \"row\",\n    paddingBottom: \"2em\"\n  },\n  button: {\n    textTransform: \"none\",\n    justifyContent: \"flex-start\",\n    fontWeight: \"bold\"\n  },\n  icon: {\n    fontSize: 20\n  },\n  content: {\n    height: \"80%\"\n  }\n});\nconst DetailsDrawerComponent = (rowData, baseUrl) => {\n  const classes = useStyles();\n  const [state, setState] = React.useState(false);\n  const configApi = useApi(configApiRef);\n  const namespaced = configApi.getOptionalBoolean(\"argocd.namespacedApps\") ?? false;\n  const toggleDrawer = (open) => (event) => {\n    if (event.type === \"keydown\" && (event.key === \"Tab\" || event.key === \"Shift\")) {\n      return;\n    }\n    setState(open);\n  };\n  const tableContent = {\n    \"Argo CD Instance\": rowData.metadata?.instance?.name ?? \"\",\n    repoUrl: rowData.spec?.source?.repoURL,\n    repoPath: rowData.spec?.source?.path,\n    destinationServer: rowData.spec?.destination?.server,\n    destinationNamespace: rowData.spec?.destination?.namespace,\n    syncStatus: rowData.status?.sync?.status,\n    images: rowData.status?.summary?.images,\n    ...baseUrl && {\n      link: /* @__PURE__ */ React.createElement(\n        MaterialButton,\n        {\n          variant: \"outlined\",\n          color: \"primary\",\n          size: \"small\",\n          title: \"Open Argo CD Dashboard\",\n          endIcon: /* @__PURE__ */ React.createElement(OpenInNewIcon, null),\n          target: \"_blank\",\n          href: `${baseUrl}/applications/${namespaced ? `${rowData.metadata.namespace}/${rowData.metadata.name}` : rowData.metadata.name}`\n        },\n        \"Open Argo CD Dashboard\"\n      )\n    }\n  };\n  const drawerContents = () => /* @__PURE__ */ React.createElement(React.Fragment, null, /* @__PURE__ */ React.createElement(\"div\", { className: classes.header }, /* @__PURE__ */ React.createElement(\n    Grid,\n    {\n      container: true,\n      direction: \"column\",\n      justifyContent: \"flex-start\",\n      alignItems: \"flex-start\"\n    },\n    /* @__PURE__ */ React.createElement(Grid, { item: true }, /* @__PURE__ */ React.createElement(Typography, { variant: \"h5\" }, \"Argo Name: \", rowData.metadata.name))\n  ), /* @__PURE__ */ React.createElement(\n    IconButton,\n    {\n      key: \"dismiss\",\n      title: \"Close the drawer\",\n      onClick: () => setState(false),\n      color: \"inherit\"\n    },\n    /* @__PURE__ */ React.createElement(CloseIcon, null)\n  )), /* @__PURE__ */ React.createElement(\"div\", { className: classes.content }, /* @__PURE__ */ React.createElement(StructuredMetadataTable, { metadata: tableContent })));\n  return /* @__PURE__ */ React.createElement(React.Fragment, null, /* @__PURE__ */ React.createElement(\n    Button,\n    {\n      title: rowData.metadata.name,\n      className: classes.button,\n      onClick: toggleDrawer(true)\n    },\n    rowData.metadata.name\n  ), /* @__PURE__ */ React.createElement(\n    Drawer,\n    {\n      anchor: \"right\",\n      classes: { paper: classes.paper },\n      open: state,\n      onClose: toggleDrawer(false)\n    },\n    drawerContents()\n  ));\n};\n\nexport { DetailsDrawerComponent };\n//# sourceMappingURL=DetailsDrawer.esm.js.map\n","import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react';\nimport { LinearProgress, Tooltip, Box, Button, List, ListItem } from '@material-ui/core';\nimport { DateTime } from 'luxon';\nimport { ARGOCD_ANNOTATION_APP_NAME, useArgoCDAppData } from './useArgoCDAppData.esm.js';\nimport { ErrorBoundary, InfoCard, Table } from '@backstage/core-components';\nimport { useApi, configApiRef } from '@backstage/core-plugin-api';\nimport { isArgocdAvailable } from '../conditions.esm.js';\nimport { useAppDetails } from './useAppDetails.esm.js';\nimport SyncIcon from '@material-ui/icons/Sync';\nimport { useEntity, MissingAnnotationEmptyState } from '@backstage/plugin-catalog-react';\nimport { DetailsDrawerComponent } from './DetailsDrawer.esm.js';\n\nconst defaultTableTitle = \"ArgoCD overview\";\nconst MessageComponent = ({\n  conditions\n}) => {\n  const [mapped, setMapped] = useState([]);\n  useEffect(() => {\n    setMapped(\n      conditions?.map((condition) => {\n        return {\n          key: `${condition.lastTransitionTime}-${condition.type}`,\n          ...condition\n        };\n      }) || []\n    );\n  }, [conditions]);\n  return /* @__PURE__ */ React.createElement(React.Fragment, null, mapped ? /* @__PURE__ */ React.createElement(List, { dense: true }, mapped.map((condition) => /* @__PURE__ */ React.createElement(ListItem, { style: { padding: 0 }, key: condition.key }, condition.message))) : null);\n};\nconst getElapsedTime = (start) => {\n  return DateTime.fromISO(start).toRelative();\n};\nconst getLastSyncState = (operationState) => {\n  return operationState.finishedAt ? getElapsedTime(operationState.finishedAt) : operationState.phase;\n};\nconst State = ({\n  value,\n  conditions\n}) => {\n  const colorMap = {\n    Pending: \"#dcbc21\",\n    Synced: \"green\",\n    Healthy: \"green\",\n    Inactive: \"black\",\n    Failed: \"red\"\n  };\n  if (conditions !== void 0) {\n    return /* @__PURE__ */ React.createElement(\n      Tooltip,\n      {\n        title: /* @__PURE__ */ React.createElement(MessageComponent, { conditions }),\n        placement: \"bottom-start\"\n      },\n      /* @__PURE__ */ React.createElement(Box, { display: \"flex\", alignItems: \"center\" }, /* @__PURE__ */ React.createElement(Button, { style: { paddingLeft: \"0px\" } }, /* @__PURE__ */ React.createElement(\n        \"span\",\n        {\n          style: {\n            display: \"block\",\n            width: \"8px\",\n            height: \"8px\",\n            borderRadius: \"50%\",\n            backgroundColor: colorMap[value] || \"#dcbc21\",\n            marginRight: \"5px\"\n          }\n        }\n      ), value))\n    );\n  }\n  return /* @__PURE__ */ React.createElement(Box, { display: \"flex\", alignItems: \"center\" }, /* @__PURE__ */ React.createElement(\n    \"span\",\n    {\n      style: {\n        display: \"block\",\n        width: \"8px\",\n        height: \"8px\",\n        borderRadius: \"50%\",\n        backgroundColor: colorMap[value] || \"#dcbc21\",\n        marginRight: \"5px\"\n      }\n    }\n  ), value);\n};\nconst OverviewComponent = ({\n  data,\n  extraColumns,\n  title,\n  subtitle,\n  retry\n}) => {\n  const configApi = useApi(configApiRef);\n  const baseUrl = configApi.getOptionalString(\"argocd.baseUrl\");\n  const supportsMultipleArgoInstances = Boolean(\n    configApi.getOptionalConfigArray(\"argocd.appLocatorMethods\")?.length\n  );\n  const getBaseUrl = (row) => {\n    if (supportsMultipleArgoInstances && !baseUrl) {\n      const instanceConfig = configApi.getConfigArray(\"argocd.appLocatorMethods\").find((value) => value.getOptionalString(\"type\") === \"config\")?.getOptionalConfigArray(\"instances\")?.find(\n        (value) => value.getOptionalString(\"name\") === row.metadata?.instance?.name\n      );\n      return instanceConfig?.getOptionalString(\"frontendUrl\") ?? instanceConfig?.getOptionalString(\"url\");\n    }\n    return baseUrl;\n  };\n  const columns = [\n    {\n      title: \"Name\",\n      highlight: true,\n      field: \"name\",\n      render: (row) => DetailsDrawerComponent(row, getBaseUrl(row)),\n      customSort: (a, b) => a.metadata.name.localeCompare(b.metadata.name)\n    },\n    {\n      title: \"Sync Status\",\n      field: \"syncStatus\",\n      render: (row) => /* @__PURE__ */ React.createElement(\n        State,\n        {\n          value: row.status.sync.status,\n          conditions: row.status.conditions\n        }\n      ),\n      customSort: (a, b) => a.status.sync.status.localeCompare(b.status.sync.status)\n    },\n    {\n      title: \"Health Status\",\n      field: \"healthStatus\",\n      render: (row) => /* @__PURE__ */ React.createElement(State, { value: row.status.health.status, conditions: void 0 }),\n      customSort: (a, b) => a.status.health.status.localeCompare(b.status.health.status)\n    },\n    {\n      title: \"Last Synced\",\n      defaultSort: \"desc\",\n      field: \"lastSynced\",\n      render: (row) => row.status.operationState ? getLastSyncState(row.status.operationState) : \"\",\n      customSort: (a, b) => {\n        return DateTime.fromISO(\n          a.status.operationState?.finishedAt || \"3000-01-01T00:00:00.000Z\"\n        ).toMillis() - DateTime.fromISO(\n          b.status.operationState?.finishedAt || \"3000-01-01T00:00:00.000Z\"\n        ).toMillis();\n      }\n    }\n  ];\n  if (supportsMultipleArgoInstances) {\n    columns.splice(1, 0, {\n      title: \"Instance\",\n      field: \"instance\",\n      render: (row) => row.metadata?.instance?.name,\n      customSort: (a, b) => a.metadata?.instance?.name.localeCompare(b.metadata?.instance?.name)\n    });\n  }\n  return /* @__PURE__ */ React.createElement(\n    Table,\n    {\n      title: title ?? defaultTableTitle,\n      subtitle,\n      options: {\n        paging: true,\n        search: false,\n        sorting: true,\n        draggable: false,\n        padding: \"dense\"\n      },\n      data: data.items || [],\n      columns: columns.concat(extraColumns),\n      actions: [\n        {\n          icon: () => /* @__PURE__ */ React.createElement(SyncIcon, null),\n          tooltip: \"Refresh\",\n          isFreeAction: true,\n          onClick: () => retry()\n        }\n      ]\n    }\n  );\n};\nconst ArgoCDDetails = ({\n  entity,\n  extraColumns,\n  title,\n  subtitle\n}) => {\n  const { url, appName, appSelector, appNamespace, projectName } = useArgoCDAppData({\n    entity\n  });\n  const { loading, value, error, retry } = useAppDetails({\n    url,\n    appName,\n    appSelector,\n    appNamespace,\n    projectName\n  });\n  if (loading) {\n    return /* @__PURE__ */ React.createElement(InfoCard, { title: title ?? defaultTableTitle, subheader: subtitle }, /* @__PURE__ */ React.createElement(LinearProgress, null));\n  }\n  if (error) {\n    return /* @__PURE__ */ React.createElement(InfoCard, { title: title ?? defaultTableTitle, subheader: subtitle }, \"Error occurred while fetching data. \", error.name, \": \", error.message);\n  }\n  if (value) {\n    if (value.items !== void 0) {\n      return /* @__PURE__ */ React.createElement(\n        OverviewComponent,\n        {\n          data: value,\n          retry,\n          extraColumns,\n          title: title ?? defaultTableTitle,\n          subtitle: subtitle ?? \"\"\n        }\n      );\n    }\n    if (Array.isArray(value)) {\n      const wrapped2 = {\n        items: value\n      };\n      return /* @__PURE__ */ React.createElement(\n        OverviewComponent,\n        {\n          data: wrapped2,\n          retry,\n          extraColumns,\n          title: title ?? defaultTableTitle,\n          subtitle: subtitle ?? \"\"\n        }\n      );\n    }\n    const wrapped = {\n      items: [value]\n    };\n    return /* @__PURE__ */ React.createElement(\n      OverviewComponent,\n      {\n        data: wrapped,\n        retry,\n        extraColumns,\n        title: title ?? defaultTableTitle,\n        subtitle: subtitle ?? \"\"\n      }\n    );\n  }\n  return null;\n};\nconst ArgoCDDetailsCard = (props) => {\n  const { entity } = useEntity();\n  return !isArgocdAvailable(entity) ? /* @__PURE__ */ React.createElement(MissingAnnotationEmptyState, { annotation: ARGOCD_ANNOTATION_APP_NAME }) : /* @__PURE__ */ React.createElement(ErrorBoundary, null, /* @__PURE__ */ React.createElement(\n    ArgoCDDetails,\n    {\n      entity,\n      extraColumns: props.extraColumns || [],\n      title: props.title,\n      subtitle: props.subtitle\n    }\n  ));\n};\n\nexport { ArgoCDDetailsCard };\n//# sourceMappingURL=ArgoCDDetailsCard.esm.js.map\n"],"names":["tableTitleCellStyles","theme","createStyles","tableContentCellStyles","listStyles","listItemStyles","TitleCell","withStyles","TableCell","ContentCell","MetadataTable","dense","children","Table","TableBody","MetadataTableItem","title","rest","TableRow","MetadataList","classes","List","MetadataListItem","ListItem","listStyle","nestedListStyle","StyledList","StyledNestedList","renderList","list","options","nested","values","item","index","toValue","renderMap","map","key","value","Typography","ItemValue","TableItem","mapToItems","info","StructuredMetadataTable","props","metadata","metadataItems","useStyles","makeStyles","DetailsDrawerComponent","rowData","baseUrl","state","setState","namespaced","toggleDrawer","open","event","tableContent","OpenInNew","drawerContents","Grid","IconButton","Close","Button","Drawer","defaultTableTitle","MessageComponent","conditions","mapped","setMapped","condition","getElapsedTime","start","getLastSyncState","operationState","State","colorMap","Tooltip","Box","OverviewComponent","data","extraColumns","subtitle","retry","configApi","supportsMultipleArgoInstances","getBaseUrl","row","instanceConfig","columns","a","b","Sync","ArgoCDDetails","entity","url","appName","appSelector","appNamespace","projectName","loading","error","LinearProgress","wrapped2","wrapped","ArgoCDDetailsCard"],"sourceRoot":""}
